title: Bloomberg Markets: Swell CEO on Impact Investing
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Swell CEO on Impact Investing
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Dave Fanger Chief Executive Officer Swell Investing Discussing investing in stock portfolios of companies that are poised for growth as well as actively bettering the world.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
